name: Sugarpocalypse
description:
Welcome to the Sugarpocalypse

Try to survive in the post-apocalyptic world,  salvage sugar from houses and sell it at the market, and with the money acquired, you buy items to give you short term benefits that will help you survive.

You have 3 stats
Happiness - sell sugar for more.
Hunger - prevents other stats from falling.
Health -  makes you move  more quickly.
All 3 stats determine how well you find sugar when searching buildings.

Join a group and you will get daily benefits to your stats, but this comes at a price, the better the group the higher the cost. Failure to pay the weekly fee, will result in being removed from the group.

This game was created as part of the SUGAR Jam and uses the SUGAR unity asset to achieve the following:

  • Account login for persistent plays across devices.
  • Joining groups and use of resources to transfer to groups to improve group benefits
  • Achievements and achievement popups on completion
  • Leaderboards for events completed and resources earned.
